document.full_text: nevada's governor on wednesday named third-term congressman dean heller to fill the nearly two years remaining in the senate term of fellow republican john ensign, who is resigning next week following a sex scandal.
document.title: dean heller named to fill nevada senate seat
lines_and_colors: nevada's governor on wednesday named third-term congressman dean heller to fill the nearly two years remaining in the senate term of fellow republican john ensign, who is resigning next week following a sex scandal.
